Plot: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.
Language: English, Italian, Polish, French, Spanish, German
Title: Under the Tuscan Sun
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 nominations.
Actors: Diane Lane, Sandra Oh, Lindsay Duncan, Raoul Bova
Writer: Frances Mayes (book), Audrey Wells (screen story), Audrey Wells (screenplay)
